text: WIDE-EXT. JACK’S HOUSE-AFTERNOON JACK drives up to his house and parks out front of it. He sits there for a few moments. INT. JACK’S CAR - AFTERNOON Jack is looking at himself in the rearview mirror of his It's night time and he looks worn from a long day at the office. EXT. JACK’S HOUSE - AFTERNOON - CONTINUOUS He slowly exits his car, attempting to brush off the stre of the day by plastering on a smile. He walks up the walkway to his house and opens the front door. INT. JACK’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - AFTERNOON - CONTINUOUS The house is dark but candle lit in a sensual and romanti way.
Honey, sorry I'm late! Long but productive day at work! Jack tries to sound positive. A laugh is heard coming fro stairs.

Kendra, is that you babe? Jack thinks the laugh belongs to his daughter, KENDRA [12 There is no response from upstairs. He notices rose petals on the staircase and starts puttin two and two together. He begins walking up the stairs whi taking off his suit jacket and tie.
Hun, you didn’t tell me you got a sitter for Kendra! You really outdid yourself this time. (CONTINUED )

Jack reaches the top of the stair case and sees a TV flickering in his daughter’s room behind the slightly aja bedroom door. There is giggling behind the door. Confused, he pushes the bedroom door open only to find hi wife, MARCY, sitting Indian style on the floor wearing a mask made out of the skin from Kendra's face. Sitting next to her is KENDRA, whose face is completely skinned off but still fully functioning, playing with her toys. She turns to look back at her father.

Come play Doll House with us daddy. The TV makes a loud noise and a 13 flashes on it. Jack's watch displays a 13:13 on it. Suddenly Marcy screams and lunges at Jack violently. Jack falls back trying to avoid his rabid wife. His watch star beeping.

Jack is breathing heavy. Jack turns to take in his surroundings. He is in a sleeping bag inside of a tent. He begins to remember where he is (on a camping trip with his closest friends). He shakes off the dream and exits the tent.
Outside of the tent, JOE, TREVOR and QUENTIN are seen hud around a camp fire. They are all drinking beers. They all seem to be in a good mood. Jack approaches the group.
Hey there sleepy head. You want a beer? (CONTINUED )
But it’s morning... Quentin tosses him a beer.
Look alive, bud. Jack catches the beer and opens it up. It froths up a lit bit at the top. He takes a sip and sits down next to everyone at the campfire.
Thanks...
Don’t mention it.
So... where was I?
The dog had killed the neighbors rabbit.

Oh yea. So the dog had killed my neighbor's rabbit. So after I panicked a little, my girl said that we could cover it up. See the neighbors were out of town and they just had this generic white rabbit. So I rushed to the store and got another and put it in the cage. Figured they would be none the wiser. Trevor starts laughing. Encouraged by Trevor’s laugh Joe continues with more excitement. Jack seems to be drifting off.

So that’s not the best part. The best part is, a few days later, Mr. And Mrs. come home. I hear a blood curdling scream, like the wife was being attacked or somethin’. So I rush on over only to find her standing in front of the cage pointing at that damn replacement rabbit and just sobbin. (CONTINUED )
A giant grin comes across Quentin’s face. Jack is still shaken from his dream.
So what happened next?

I’m gettin to that. So anyways I ask her husband what’s wrong. And he tells me that shes upset cus the rabbit died right before they went on vacation and they buried it, but there it was now just sitting in that cage. Joe, Trevor, and Quentin all start laughing, but Jack is silent.
No way!
Ain’t that the craziest story you ever heard?
Yeah, it was even crazier the first time I heard it, on Oprah.
Oprah told my story? How’d she hear it? I don’t remember tellin her nuthin.
It’s an Urban legend, dumbass. Jack looks down at his wrist and notices that his digital watch reads 13:13. Suddenly Jack becomes a bit uneasy.
But it actually happened to me. Jack jumps into the conversation abruptly.
Who messed around with my watch?
What do you mean? (CONTINUED )
Someone changed it to army time and set the wrong time on it.
Ain’t no body messed with your watch there, sleeping beauty. Joe, Quentin, and Trevor laugh. Jack is visually displeas
It’s not 13:13. Who messed with my watch?
Jack no one touched your damn watch. Why’s it matter anyway? Just change it back. Anyways Joe, your story has been told a thousand times.
Fuck you Quentin. Jack looks upset.
Jack, Joe, Quentin, and Trevor are packing up the packing gear into Quentin’s car. Jack is a little out of it. He didn’t sleep much last nig
Come on guys! Get the lead out.
Well maybe if you got off your high horse and carried more this would be done quicker.
He has a point, Quentin.
Hey man, ya’ll gotta work now, I gotta work later. After its all packed up you guys get to rest for a while and I have to drive.
I would gladly drive. (CONTINUED )
Not an option. Joe stuffs some camping gear into the trunk of the car.
There’s only a little bit left. Let’s just get it done while the princess gets his beauty rest. Quentin turns and looks at Jack who is doing nothing.
Jack what are you doing? Jack looks up at Quentin.
Sorry buddy. I just kind of zoned out. I didn’t really sleep last night. Quentin laughs. He steps down from his car and walks towa Jack.
Are you kidding me bud? All you did was sleep last night.
I didn’t get back to sleep after I woke up. I had a nightmare, man.
Next thing you’re gonna do is tell me you're wetting your bed. Nightmares... Ha!
Quentin, shut up... Quentin surveys Jacks face and sees he is not happy. He t to cheer him up.
Jack, you were a cop, buddy! No nightmare can scare you that bad. We saw much worse things on the force together. I know you did, killer. Quentin nudges Jack with his elbow and chuckles. (CONTINUED )
Jack is visually displeased. His facial expression reads disgust. He pushes Quentin’s arm down.
Just stop.
What’s the matter, Jacky boy? Quentin smiles.
Let’s just finish packing and go. Jack starts to walk away from Quentin and help with the packing.
Let’s get a move on. Jack, Joe and Trevor all roll their eyes as they finish packing the last of the car up. Quentin walks up to the drivers seat and honks the horn.
Let's go!

That’s everything. The guys start walking to get into the car as Joe closes trunk of the car. Jack climbs into the passenger seat as Trevor gets into t back seat. Joe gets into the back seat shortly after. The car drives off.

We see a WIDE SHOT of the car driving through a bare dese INT. QUENTIN’S CAR - DAY Quentin is driving his car. Jack is riding shotgun. Trevo and Joe are in the back seat. The car is packed up with a the camping gear. (CONTINUED )
I’m glad we all had time to go on this trip and spend time together. It’s been a while.
Eh, you know how it is. Going through a divorce isn’t the easiest of things. Especially if you have a kid.
Yup, before you two split up Marcy never would have let you come out to hang with the boys.
Oh and why is that? Quentin makes a whip sound effect with his mouth.
Very funny.
How old is Kendra now?
She’s 12.
She is the sweetest little girl.
Takes after her mom. Quentin makes a whip sound effect with his mouth. Jack shoots him a glare. Quentin smiles a stupid grin. Trevor and Joe laugh. Jack turns his head away from Quentin.
Let’s put on some music.
Sure thing. Go for it, DJ. (CONTINUED )
Jack reaches to turn on the radio. His hand freezes. He notices that the clock on the car reads 13:13.
You gonna put on some music or what?
Super funny guys. Who keeps messing with all the clocks?
What do you mean?
It’s just in some type of weird time again.
Yeah, it’s 13:13 brotha, so what?
I dunno, it’s just a little odd, man. Same time as on my watch at the campfire.
Law of attraction. Jack notices some road kill on the road.
Road Kill. Look out.
Good call. Quentin swerves the car and hits it.

Two points! Jack looks disgusted. Joe And Trevor laugh. EXT. JACK’S HOUSE - DAY Jack, Trevor, Joe and Quentin walk towards the house carr camping gear. Kendra is seen outside sitting in the grass, cupping her hands together. (CONTINUED )
Hey, darlin. Whatcha got in your hands?
Nothing.
Is mommy inside? Kendra nods. The guys all say hi to Kendra while passing
Hey Kendra.
Howdy Kendra.

Kendra. Kendra smiles at everyone. She looks tired. The guys all into the house. Kendra opens her hands. Inside her hands is a spider. She looks at it crawl on her hand for a couple seconds before squashing it in her hand. She then takes the dead spider eats it. INT. JACK’S HOUSE- KITCHEN- DAY Jack and the guys enter the kitchen. The guys take a seat the table in the kitchen. Marcy is standing at the sink, it looks like she is washi dishes. She is muttering to herself.
Hey Honey! Marcy doesn’t acknowledge him. Jack is visibly upset but quickly shakes it off.
You guys want anything?
I’ll take a brew.
Alright, anyone else? (CONTINUED )
Yup.
Right here. Jack starts walks towards the fridge and opens it up.
You guys want a lager?
Yessir. Jack tosses Quentin a beer.
Same here. Jack tosses Trevor a beer and Joe a beer.
Thanks brotha. Jack walks back to the table with the guys and sits down.
Marcy, come join us. There is no answer from Marcy. Jack turns to look back at Marcy. She is still doing what looks like washing the dis
Marcy come sit down with us. There is still no answer.
Marcy?
In a minute! Just got to finish this. It just won’t come off.
It’s okay, hun. Jack turns to look at the guys.
She’s a bit of a workaholic. Are ya'll staying for dinner? (CONTINUED )
The guys all look at each other.
Fuck yeah we will. If you’1ll have us.
Quentin, we got a long ride ahead of us back home.

Joe, lock it up. Jack begins to tune out Joe and Quentin’s bickering. Jack zoning out just staring at them. Quentin shoves Joe and i knocks over Joe’s beer. Jack looks down at his arms resting on the table. His wri watch reads 13:13 again. The beer spills across his arms slowly.
What the hell, guys.
I’m real sorry Jack. Let me clean that up for you.
It’s fine. I'll go get some paper towels. Jack starts walking towards the sink where Marcy is.
Hun, where do we keep the paper towels? His wife is muttering to herself louder. Jack pauses and looks at her.
Marcy, what are you saying? She mutters again.
Marcy? She continues muttering.
Marce? (CONTINUED )
He starts walking towards her.
It just wont come off! Jack stops walking.
What wont come off, sweetie?
She goes back to muttering “It just won’t come off.” To herself over and over again. Jack starts walking towards again.
Marcy it’s fine, leave the dishes alone. I’1l do them. She continues muttering to herself. Jack comes up behind her and grabs her by her waist and kisses her on her cheek, never once looking down.
Don’t worry about the dishes Marcy, everything is going to be fine.
It just wont come off.

What wont? Jack looks down over Marcy’s shoulder into the sink. Horrified, he sees that she has completely scratched off of the skin on her arm. He lets go of her and gasps. She continues scratching her and muttering “It Just wont come off.” To her self.
Marcy, stop!

What’s wrong? Jack quickly tries to pull Marcy’s unaffected arm away fr her bloody arm in an attempt to make her stop scratching herself. He quickly grabs a nearby wash cloth and wraps i around the wound. (CONTINUED )
Call an ambulance!
What happened?
Just call a fucking ambulance! Marcy starts thrashing and struggling trying to make Jack go of her. Jack wraps his arms around her and holds her tight so she can’t struggle anymore.
Jack is chasing after a hospital gurney carrying Marcy. Doctors are huddled around the gurney checking her vitals A Doctor turns around and looks at Jack.
Sir, you are going to have to wait here.
But that’s my wife.

I understand, sir, but you are going to have to wait here. Someone will come and get you in a moment. The doctors wheel Marcy away as Jack is left standing in hallway watching them push her away. INT. JACK’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - DAY Trevor, Quentin, and Joe are all sitting in the living ro
Shit! Who is watching Kendra?
Methinks you should be! (CONTINUED )
Methinks you are an asshole. Trevor gets up and starts walking towards the front door.
Methinks you should grab me a fucking beer while you are up. Trevor looks annoyed.
What the fuck?!? Quentin shoots a glare at Joe.
No one asked you Joe. Quentin turns to look at Trevor.
Just get me a god damn beer!
No!
Go get me a mother fucking beer before I smash your fucking face in. Trevor frowns.

Jack is sitting in the waiting room. Many people are wait for injured friends or family members. A young man, ALEX, is getting rowdy in the waiting room. ORDERLY #1 talks to him as SECURITY #1 stands close by.
Just let me go see my fucking brother!
Sir, the hospital is very busy right now. We will take you to see your brother when things calm down and we know he is stable. (CONTINUED )
You don’t understand. I don’t want to know if the bastard is stable! I just need to see him now! Jack turns to look at the situation.
Sir, you need to CALM DOWN!
Fuck this! Alex tries to push past the Orderly, but the security gua restrains him. Suddenly, ORDERLY #2, taps Jack on the shoulder. Startled, Jack jumps.
Room #13. She is heavily sedated. Jack seems confused. Again he notices that number.
Wait. What?
She is in room 13... your wife. This time the information registers with Jack.
Don’t you think it’s bad luck to have a room 13 in your hospital? The Orderly looks very angry. Off to the side we see the security guard dragging ALEX out of the waiting room.
Look, buddy. I’ve had enough fucking bullshit for one day. Just go see your god damn wife. She is in room fucking 13. Or don’t. It’s up to you. Just get the fuck out of my sight.
No need to be so rude. Jack pushes past the orderly and walks out of the waiting room.  17.

Jack is walking through the ICU. Jack sees a few people w more violent injuries then others within different rooms the ICU. Some, suffering from gunshots to the head or swo through the torso are seen being wheeled by. One man suffering from 3rd degree burns over his entire b grabs Jack's arm as Jack passes by.
Help me! The burned guy lets out his last breathe and then collaps in the gurney, dead. DOCTOR PAPPAS who was wheeling the burned guy’s gurney stops and takes a deep breathe.
Is everything okay, Doctor?
That’s the 13th guy I lost today. This is the busiest day we have ever had at this hospital. Jack perks up when he hears the number 13 again.
Do you have any idea why?

Do I look like a fucking scientist or a news reporter? I’m a god damn mother fucking doctor, damnit. You don’t think I’m qualified to be a doctor? Then you wear my jacket... here. Doctor Pappas takes off his doctor jacket and tries to ha it to Jack but Jack backs away. While backing away Jack b into a gurney behind him. Jack turns around to see a dead woman with the number 13 carved into her forehead. The doctor that was attending t her pulls the covers over her lifeless face. Jack keeps walking. He sees another doctor leaving a room This is DOCTOR PALUMBO.
Excuse me doctor. (CONTINUED )
What do you need? I’m really busy...
Where is room 13? Doctor Palumbo surveys Jack.
Why do you need to know?
My wife... she is badly injured. She’s in room 13.
What makes her so special?
What?
What the fuck happened to her? I don’t got all day.
She scratched off all the skin on her arm. Doctor Palumbo laughs.
What’s so funny?
You’re on the wrong floor, Jackass. This level is for critical patients, not suicidal retards.
Excuse me? Jack is doing his best not to get angry.
Floor three. Take the elevator to your right. Or you can take the stairs. Up to you. Now get out of my sight. I got work to do, dumbass. (CONTINUED )
Jack puts his head down and quickly walks to the elevator enters it.

Jack presses level three in the elevator. He stands there the elevator goes up. He is in the elevator alone. He is doing his best to hold himself together and remain strong is visibly upset. The elevator gets to level three and opens. Jack exits th elevator quickly.

Jack walks out of the elevator into Level 3 of the hospit There are a bunch of hospital rooms but it looks a lot mo calm. Jack walks through the floor looking at the door numbers. then spots a FEMALE RECEPTIONIST. Jack walks up to the receptionist. She is writing on something at her desk. Jack stands in front of her.

My wife is in room 13. Do you know where that is? The receptionist looks up at Jack and points to room 13. turns to look at where she is pointing and sees room 13. 14's door is slightly open, just enough that you can see inside.
Its right over there. The receptionist goes back to looking at a schedule on he desk that she is writing on.
Thanks. I was beginning to think everyone in this hospital was an asshole. The receptionist looks back at Jack and glares.
Only you are sir. She then looks back down at her schedule. (CONTINUED )

Never mind. Everyone in this hospital is an asshole. Jack turns and walks to his wife’s room. He stands in fro of it for a moment and takes a deep breathe. Jack turns to look at the slightly open door of the room to him. Inside the room he can see a a beautiful woman, CANDACE sitting down next to a hospital bed and leaning o it. In the bed is an unconscious young boy, JIMMY [9]. Jack looks at them for a couple of seconds. He then turns back to the door of his wife’s room. Jack stares at the 1 the door for a couple of seconds then puts his hand on th doorknob. He shakes his head and enters the room. The doo closes slowly behind him.

Jack walks into the room, locking the door behind him. In hospital bed, Marcy is laying there heavily sedated. She motionless. Jack turns around and locks the door behind him. He then walks over to his wife and kisses her on the forehead wit long and lingering kiss. He then walks over to the armcha next to her and sits down. Tired and overwhelmed by everything he has seen today, Jack begins to drift off in light sleep. INT. JACK’S LIVING ROOM Joe and Quentin both crack open a brand new beer as they in front of the television laughing. Over their shoulders, through the window, Trevor can be s outside watching Kendra. Quentin turns around and looks b at Trevor.
He’s a regular Mary Poppins ain't he? Joe laughs.
Yup.  21.

Jacks POV: Jack opens his eyes a little and sees his wife still asleep in the bed in front of him. He slowly closes eyes making the SCREEN go black. He has drifted off into slumber. INT. JACK’S LIVING ROOM - DREAM WORLD Jack slowly opens his eyes. He is no longer in the hospit bedroom. Instead he is standing in his living room, howev it doesn’t look like his living room. Help me, Jack! Jack keeps reaching for her but it seems like something i holding him back. His legs are stuck in the ground and th room is stretching. Jack turns to look at the windows. A mob of people run towards the window and start banging on them loudly.

Jack wakes up in the hospital room. There is a bang on th door. Someone tries to turn the doorknob. When it doesn't turn, because it is locked from the inside, they begin jiggling it. Marcy is starting to stir in her bed. Jack looks uneasy. gets up and starts walking towards the door to see who it He approaches slowly.

Sir, that isn’t your room! The jiggling of the doorknob stops. Relieved, Jack return his seat by Marcy.  22. EXT. JACK’S HOUSE- DAY Trevor watches Kendra as she sits outside on the sidewalk Joe and Quentin are seen inside the house, through the window, watching TV. Kendra has chalk in her hand.
Hey there, Kendra, what are we playing? Kendra doesn’t respond.

None of your fuckin’ business. Shocked, Trevor stares at Kendra with his mouth wide open She continues drawing. After a few seconds, Trevor decide respond.

Holy shit!
Trevor! Quentin runs over to Kendra.
Get off of him! Kendra doesn’t respond. Quentin attempts to pull Kendra o of Trevor but she begins thrashing and trying to attack h She jumps on top of him in a frontwards 'piggyback ride'.

Kendra starts scratching Quentin’s face. She tries to bit his neck but Joe rushes behind her and grabs her and pull her back. Joe has to throw her off of him. Once Kendra hi the ground Quentin begins attacking her.

Why? This little bitch was attacking me! Kendra is trashing on the ground. Quentin punches her in face.
That’s Jack’s kid!
The bitch tried to kill me. Hold her down then. Taking a cue from Quentin, Joe grabs Kendra and begins to hold her down. Quentin runs over to his car and gets in i

Holding her steady!

Shit.

Please! Help me! He is barely able to limp a few steps from his house. A CRAZED WOMAN emerges from the house. She lunges at the ma and jumps on top of him. She uses her thumbs and pushes i his eye balls as hard as she can. Blood begins to emerge his eye sockets as he screams in pain.
Fuck this! Quentin quickly switches the car into drive and floors it runs over both of them with his car killing them instantl

I’m going for a high score. Quentin jumps out of his car to talk to Joe.
Wanna go back inside?

Sure. Quentin and Joe start walking towards the house as if the are in a trance.  28. INT. JACK’S HOUSE - CONTINUOUS Quentin and Joe go back inside the house as if nothing ha happened today. They seem to be in some sort of trance. They pass by a sticky note calendar, that every day you r off a new page to show the next day. The Calendar reveals that today is January 13th 2014.

On it. Joe walks into the kitchen and grabs a beer for Quentin a one for himself. He hands the beer to Quentin. Quentin ta out his pocket knife and opens the beer with his knife, h then smiles and looks at Joe. Quentin starts laughing.
What’s so funny?

This. Quentin suddenly stabs Joe in the stomach. Quentin starts laughing hysterically, Joe is in pain and shock. Suddenly begins laughing. Infected by Quentin’s laughter, Joe’s pa disappears. Quentin reaches out to Joe’s stomach and gets his hands soaked in Joe’s blood. Joe does the same. Quentin and Joe both start smearing the blood on the wall the house painting the number 13 over and over again.
Jack is sitting watching his wife lay in bed. She wakes u Excited, Jack sits up more in his seat.
Baby, you’re awake. Marcy looks at him. (CONTINUED )

I’m just going to call the guys and get Kendra on the phone. I’m sure she want’s to talk to her mommy. Jack dials and puts the phone up to his ear. The phone call is cut shor however when Marcy goes into a murderous rampage and trie kill Jack. Marcy begins clawing at Jack. Marcy then tries to bite him on the neck. Jack notes her trying to bite him so he moves his hand to block her bite freeing her other hand. She grabs him by the throat and t to choke him. Jack pushes Marcy away from him with force sending her bo into the window. The window shatters behind Marcy. She tu around to look at the broken glass.
I’m sorry, baby. I didn’t mean to push you that hard. We need to get you some help. She looks back at Jack for a few moments and smiles. She Jumps out of the window.

Marcy no! Jack runs towards the window but it is too late. Devastat Jack looks out of the window and sees his wife dead on th ground, three floors down. Jack collapses onto the floor. He is a mess. They can’t hear me. Of course they can’t hear me. Jack begins calming himself down and walking towards the slowly. The jiggling of the doorknob suddenly stops. Puzz Jack moves towards the door even quicker. He slowly grabs knob and turns it.  31.

Jack opens up the door. A horrified expression comes acro on his face. The door quickly closes behind him and locks The CAMERA pulls back to reveal blood on the hospital flo and walls, people dead on the ground and a mob of crazy people quickly approaching.
